Basic

```html
<Tooltip placement="left" content="some tips">
	<Button>Tooltip on left</Button>
</Tooltip>
<Tooltip placement="top" content="some tips">
	<Button>Tooltip on top</Button>
</Tooltip>
<Tooltip placement="bottom" content="some tips">
	<Button>Tooltip on bottom</Button>
</Tooltip>
<Tooltip placement="right" content="some tips">
	<Button>Tooltip on right</Button>
</Tooltip>
```
